item.description:
Benefit For Kathy ( Leger ) Bitter
Kathy is a wife and mother of 2 children, ages 10 and 14. She is battling lung cancer and also the after effects of brain surgery. She is having Chemo therapy which will continue for many months making it impossible for her to work.

Please join us at the
Franco American Club
300 Water St., Leominster, MA
7pm to Midnight, Sat. March 24th 2012
Raffles ~ 50/50 ~ Light Snacks ~ $10 Donation

DJ Alan Hep2theJive
1950S Really Rockin Country Swing
Brief Group Swing Dance Lesson

Donations can also be made to the
Kathy Bitter Benefit Fund
C/O I-C Credit Union, 300 Bemis Rd.
Fitchburg, MA 01420

Directions: To The Franco American Club
From Rt 2 East or West
Take exit 33 (I-190 S ~ Leominster/Worcester)
Continue on Mechanic St. for 0.9 mi
Turn right onto 9th St. and drive for 0.3 mi
Franco Club Straight Ahead 62ft. To Water St

group.name: Northern Central MA, Southern NH Hiking Group

item.name: Benefit Dance For Kathy Ledger Bitter 1950's Really Rockin Country Swing
